title: Dare To Take
description: Arabella GrayStudious. Good Girl. Liar.I warned her. I told her I would break her if she stayed.Who knew watching her shatter would taste so sweet?Eli TraversOutcast. Artist. Monster.He vowed to make me payâ€”to ruin me.Only now it's my own sin that will break me.The monsters of Churchill Bradley Academy are stirring and deadly dangers haunt the halls.In this new game of cat and mouse, secret lovers and sinful dares, will all innocence be lost?
author: L. Ann
